page.title: 10A FARM IN TRELLECH.
page.content: A TYPICAL FARM IN OUR AREA IS RED BARN FARM RUN BY MR WILLIAMS AND HIS FATHER IT IS MADE UP OF 107 ACRES OF LAND SURROUNDING THE HOUSE AND BUILDINGS. THE FARM IS A MIXED FARM REARING 300 SHEEP, 70 CATTLE, PIGS, GOATS AND POULTRY. MR. WILLIAMS SHEARS AND DIPS THE SHEEP HIMSELF. THEY HAVE FIVE TRACTORS, A COMBINE-HARVESTER,A POTATOE HARVESTER, A SWEDE DRILL, A CORN DRILL,TWO CHAIN SAWS, A SPRAYER, A HAY BOB, A MOWER,AN ELEVATOR, A CORN AUGER, AND A LAND ROVER. HE GROWS GRASS FOR GRAZING, SILAGE AND HAY; BARLEY FOR BEEF CATTLE;OATS FOR EWES IN LAMB,YOUNG CALVES, AND GOATS;AND WHEAT FOR PIGS AND POULTRY. HE GROWS POTATOES TO EAT AND TO FEED CALVES, AND SWEDES AND TURNIPS FOR SHEEP.
